Text: "’Alā Khallidī" (Arabic: ألا خلّدي‎ ‎ ) is the former national anthem of Tunisia.

4:
--------------------
Text: Ala Khallidi:  The results were examined first by a commission of the Board of Education, which selected the submissions of the hymn poet Jalaleddine Naccache (1910–1989) and the composer and director of the Conservatoire of Tunis Salah El Mahdi (1925-2014).
Triplets:<Jalaleddine Naccache
5:
--------------------
Text: Ala Khallidi:  The works were presented to the president without announcing the selection that already been made.
Triplets:<Ala Khallidi
6:
--------------------
Text: Ala Khallidi:  He selected the same version as the commission had.
Triplets:<Ala Khallidi
